text.1: Based on the edition by Albrecht Weber: Das Saptaçatakam des Hâla, Leipzig : Brockhaus 1881
text.5: 1) The verses are separated into two lines at the caesura; 'ab' refers to the first two pādas and 'cd' to the second two.
text.6: 2) Weber's capitalizations and punctuations (including exclamation points after vocatives and dashes between āmreḍitas as in 'taṃ-taṃ') are not transcribed.
text.7: 3) Since there are two Sanskrit verses included (719 and 965), Weber's convention of using a diaeresis to distinguish disyllabic 'aï' and 'aü' from monosyllabic 'ai' and 'au' is followed here.  In other respects the orthography (including presence or absence of yaśruti and anunāsika) follows Weber's.

text.72: amiaṃ pāuakavvaṃ paḍhiuṃ souṃ ca je ṇa āṇaṃti /
text.73: kāmassa tattatattiṃ kuṇaṃti te kaha ṇa lajjaṃti /
text.78: tāva ccia raïsamae mahilāṇaṃ vibbhamā virāaṃti /
text.80: ṇohaliam appaṇo kiṃ ṇa maggase maggase kuravaassa /
text.81: eaṃ khu suhaa tuha hasaï valiamuhapaṃkaaṃ jāā /
text.83: kiṃ sahaï ko vi kassa vi pāapahāraṃ pahuppaṃto /
text.84: attā taha ramaṇijjaṃ aṃhaṃ gāmassa maṃḍaṇīhūaṃ /
text.88: sahi erisi ccia gaī mā ruvvasu taṃsavaliamuhaaṃdaṃ /
text.92: saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭṭhaṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo /
text.93: maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ maraṇaṃ pi salāhanijjaṃ se /
text.95: muhamāruaṃ piaṃto dhūmāi sihī ṇa pajjalaï /
text.97: chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā /
text.98: kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï sahīhi ia pucchiāi muddhāe /
text.100: amaamaa gaaṇasehara raaṇīmukhatilaa caṃda de chivasu /
text.101: chitto jehi jiaamo mamaṃ pi tehiṃ cia karehiṃ /
text.102: ehijja so paüttho ahaaṃ kuppejja so vi aṇuṇejja /
text.103: ia kassa vi phalaï maṇoramāṇa mālā piaamammi /
text.104: duggaakuḍaṃvaaṭṭhī kaha ṇu mae dhoieṇa soḍhavvā /
text.108: aliapasuttaa viṇimīliaccha de suhaa majjha oāsaṃ /
text.110: asamatta maṃḍaṇa ccia vacca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa /
text.115: gose vi oṇaamuhī aha se tti piaṃ ṇa saddhahimo /
text.116: piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ ca garuāi do vi dukkhāi /
text.117: jīa tumaṃ kārijjasi tīa ṇamo āhijāīe /
text.118: ekko vi kālasāro ṇa dei gaṃtuṃ paāhiṇa calaṃto /
text.120: ṇa kuṇaṃto ccia māṇaṃ ṇisāsu suhasuttadaravivuddhānaṃ /
text.124: ṇavalaïpaharaṃ aṃge jahiṃ jahiṃ mahaï dearo dāuṃ /
text.125: romaṃca daṃdarāī tahiṃ tahiṃ dīsaï vahūe /
text.126: ajja mae teṇa viṇā aṇuhūasuhāi saṃbharaṃtīe /
text.129: gāmo gāmaṇiṇaṃdaṇa tujjha kae taha vitaṇuāi /
text.130: paharavaṇamaggavisame jāā kiccheṇa lahaï se ṇiddaṃ /
text.131: gāmaṇiuttassa ure pallī uṇa se suhaṃ suaï /
text.132: aha saṃbhāviamaggo suhaa tue ccea ṇavara ṇivvūḍho /
text.133: eṇhiṃ hiae aṇṇaṃ aṇṇaṃ vāāi loassa /
text.134: uṇhāi ṇīsasaṃto kīsa maha paraṃmuhīa saaṇaddhe /
text.137: raïrahasiharadhaeṇa va muheṇa chāhi ccia ṇa pattā /
text.141: asaī saajjiāduggaā a ṇaha khaṃḍiaṃ sīlaṃ /
text.146: sāhīṇe vi piaame patte vi chaṇe ṇa maṃḍio appā /
text.148: tujjha vasaï tti hiaaṃ imehi diṭṭho tumaṃ ti acchīiṃ /
text.149: tuha virahe kisiāi ti tīe aṃgāi vi piāiṃ /
text.150: sabbhāvaṇe habharie ratte rajjijjaï tti juttam iṇaṃ /
text.151: aṇahiae uṇa hiaaṃ jaṃ dijjaï taṃ jaṇo hasaï /
text.152: āraṃbhaṃtassa dhuaṃ lacchī maraṇaṃ va hoi purisassa /
text.153: taṃ maraṇam aṇāraṃbhe vi hoi lacchī uṇa ṇa hoi /
text.156: akkhaḍaï piā hiae aṇṇaṃ mahilāaṇaṃ ramaṃtassa /
text.157: diṭṭhe sarisammi guṇe sarisammi guṇe aīsaṃte /
text.159: aṇiattāsu a rāīsu putti kiṃ daḍḍhamāṇeṇa /
text.160: kallaṃ kira kharatiao pavasihaï pio tti suvvaï jaṇammi /
text.161: taha vaḍḍha bhaavaï ṇise jaha se kallaṃ cia ṇa hoi /
text.164: aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de devva karesu amha daïassa /
text.165: purisā ekkaṃtarasā ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti /
text.166: thoaṃ pi ṇa ṇīi imā majjhaṇhe ua sarīratalalukkā /
text.167: āavabhaeṇa chāhī vi tā pahia kiṃ ṇa vīsamasī /
text.168: suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ pi dūrāhi amha āṇeṃta /
text.169: uaāraa jara jīaṃ pi ṇeṃta ṇa kaāvarāhosi /
text.170: āma jaro me maṃdo ahava ṇa maṃdo jaṇassa kā tattī /
text.171: suhaücchaa suhaa suaṃdhagaṃdha mā gaṃdhiriṃ chivasu /
text.173: darapurisāini visamiri jāṇasu purisāṇa jaṃ dukkhaṃ /
text.175: uaassa va tāviasīalassa viraso raso hoi /
text.179: païṇo dhaṇurava kaṃkhiri romaṃcaṃ kiṃ muhā vahasi /
text.180: sahaï sahaï tti teṇa tahā ramiā suraaduvviaḍḍeṇa /
text.181: pavvāasirīsāi va jaha se jāāi aṃgāiṃ /
text.183: aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāriacchī tuha kaeṇa /
text.184: ajjaṃ cea paüttho ujjāgarao jaṇassa ajjea /
text.189: suṇṇaṃ kalahā aṃtī sahīhi ruṇṇā ṇa ohasiā /
text.190: hiaaṇṇuehi samaaṃ asamattāiṃ pi jaha suhāveṃti /
text.191: kajjāi maṇe ṇa tahā iarehi samāṇiāiṃ pi /
text.198: jaï hosi ṇa tassa piā aṇudiahaṃ ṇīsahehi aṃgehiṃ /
text.200: hemaṃtiāsu aïdīharāsu rāīsu taṃ si aviṇiddā /
text.201: ciraarapaütthavaïe ṇa suṃdaraṃ jaṃ diā suasi /
text.202: jaï cikkhillabhaüppuapaam iṇam alasāi tuha pae diṇṇaṃ /
text.203: tā suhaa kaṃḍaïjjaṃtam aṃgam eṇhiṃ kiṇo vahasi /
text.204: patto chaṇo ṇa sohaï aïppahāe vva puṇṇimāaṃdo /
text.205: aṃtaviraso vva kāmo asaṃpaāṇo a parioso /
text.206: pāṇiggahaṇe ccia pavvaīa ṇāaṃ sahīhi sohaggaṃ /
text.210: jettiamettaṃ tīraï ṇivvoḍhuṃ desu tettiaṃ paṇaaṃ /
text.212: vahuvallahassa jā hoi vallahā kaha vi paṃca diahāiṃ /
text.213: sā kiṃ chaṭṭhaṃ maggaï katto miṭṭhaṃ ca vahuaṃ ca /
text.214: jaṃ jaṃ so ṇijjhāaï aṃgoāsaṃ mahaṃ aṇimisaccho /
text.215: pacchāemi a taṃ taṃ icchāmi a teṇa dīsaṃtaṃ /
text.216: daḍhamaṇṇudūmiāi vi gahio daïammi pechaha imīe /
text.220: ṇa vi taha viesavāso doggaccaṃ maha jaṇei saṃtāvaṃ /
text.222: khaṃdhaggiṇā vaṇesuṃ taṇehi gāmammi rakkhio pahio /
text.230: addaṃsaṇeṇa pemmaṃ avei aïdaṃsaṇeṇa vi avei /
text.231: pisuṇajaṇakaṃpieṇa vi avei emea vi avei /
text.235: ia ciṃtaṃtāṇa maṇe thaṇāṇa kasaṇaṃ muhaṃ jāaṃ /
text.236: so tujjha kae suṃdari taha jhīṇo sumahilo haliaütto /
text.237: jaha se macchariṇīa vi doccaṃ jāāi paḍivaṇṇaṃ /
text.238: dakkhiṇṇeṇa vi eṃto suhaa suhāvesi aṃha hiaāiṃ /
text.239: ṇikkaïaveṇa jāṇaṃ gao si kā ṇivvuī tāṇaṃ /
text.241: so vi hasaṃtīa mae gahio vīeṇa kaṃṭhammi /
text.245: païrikkammi vi viṇaāvalaṃvaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇaṃtī /
text.246: muhamārueṇa taṃ kaṇha goraaṃ rāhiāi avaṇeṃto /
text.247: eāṇa vallavīṇaṃ aṇṇāṇa vi goraaṃ harasi /
text.248: kiṃ dāva kaā ahavā karesi kāhisi a suhaa ettāhe /
text.250: ṇūmaṃti je pahuttaṃ kuviaṃ dāsa vva je pasāaṃti /
text.251: te ccia mahilāṇa piā sesā sāmi ccia varāā /
text.252: taïā kaaggha mahuara ṇa ramasi aṇṇāsu pupphajāīsu /
text.255: siviṇaapīeṇa va pāṇieṇa taṇha ccia ṇa phiṭṭā /
text.256: suaṇo jaṃ desam alaṃkarei taṃ cia karei pavasaṃto /
text.258: so ṇāma saṃbharijjaï pabbhasio jo khaṇaṃ pi hiaāhi /
text.259: saṃbhariavvaṃ ca kaaṃ gaaṃ ca pemmaṃ ṇirālaṃvaṃ  /
text.260: ṇāsaṃ va sā kavoleajja vituha daṃtamaṃḍalaṃ vālā /
text.262: diṭṭhā cūā agghāiā surā dakkhiṇāṇilo sahio /
text.263: kajjāiṃ cia garuāi māmi ko vallaho kassa /
text.264: ramiūṇa paaṃ pi gao jāhe uvaūhiuṃ paḍiṇiutto /
text.265: ahaaṃ paütthavaïa vva takkhaṇaṃ so pavāsi vva /
text.268: dukkhaṃ deṃto vi suhaṃ jaṇei jo jassa vallaho hoi /
text.270: dhario dhario vialaï uvaeso piasahīhi dijjaṃto /
text.277: cīe vaṃdhussa va aṭṭhiāi ruarī samucciṇaï /
text.279: ṭhāṇe ṭhāṇe ccia laggamāṇa keṇā 'vi ḍajjhihisi /
text.280: jo tīa ahararāo rattiṃ uvvāsio piaameṇa /
text.281: so ccia dīsaï gose savattiṇaaṇesu saṃkaṃto /
text.288: kamalāarā ṇa maliā haṃsā uḍḍāviā ṇa a piucchā /
text.289: keṇa vi gāmataḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇiaṃ chūḍhaṃ /
text.290: keṇa maṇe bhaggamaṇoraheṇa saṃlāviaṃ pavāso tti /
text.291: savisāi va alasāaṃti jeṇa vahuāi aṃgāiṃ /
text.292: ajja vi vālo dāmoaro tti ia jaṃpie jasoāe /
text.294: te viralā sappurisā jāṇa siṇeho ahiṇṇamuharāo /
text.295: aṇudiaha vaḍḍhamāṇo riṇaṃ va puttesu saṃkamaï /
text.299: challiṃ va muaï viṃjho mehehi visaṃghaḍaṃtehiṃ /
text.304: vaṃdīa ṇihaavaṃdhavavimaṇāi vi pakkalo tti corajuvā /
text.305: aṇurāeṇa pulaïo guṇesu ko maccharaṃ vahaï /
text.306: ajja kaïmo vi diaho vāhavahū rūvajovvaṇummattā /
text.313: alihiaduppariallaṃ pi ṇei raṇṇaṃ dhaṇuṃ vāho /
text.315: vallahavāeṇa alaṃ mama tti vahuso bhaṇaṃtīe /
text.316: kaïavarahiaṃ pemmaṃ ṇa tthi ccia māmi māṇuse loe /
text.317: aha hoi kassa viraho virahe hoṃtammi ko jiaï /
text.318: accheraṃ va ṇihiṃ miva sagge rajjaṃ va amaapāṇaṃ va /
text.319: āsi mha taṃ muhuttaṃ viṇiaṃsaṇadaṃsaṇaṃ tissā /
text.320: sā tujjha vallahā taṃ si majjha veso si tīa tujjha ahaṃ /
text.321: vālaa phuḍaṃ bhaṇāmo pemmaṃ kira vahuviāraṃ ti /
text.322: ahaaṃ lajjāluiṇī tassa a ummaccharāi pemmāiṃ /
text.323: sahiāaṇo vi ṇiuṇo alāhi kiṃ pāarāeṇa /
text.326: taha māṇo māṇadhaṇāi tīa emea dūram aṇuvaddho /
text.327: jaha se aṇuṇīa pio ekkaggāma ccia paüttho /
text.328: sāloa ccia sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa /
text.329: ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa /
text.330: vāharaü maṃ sahīo tissā gotteṇa kiṃ tha bhaṇieṇa /
text.331: thirapemmā hou jahiṃ tahiṃ pi mā kiṃ pi ṇaṃ bhaṇaha /
text.332: rūaṃ acchīsu ṭhiaṃ phariso aṃgesu jaṃpiaṃ kaṇṇe /
text.333: hiaaṃ hiae ṇihiaṃ vioiaṃ kiṃ tha devveṇa /
text.338: vasaï jahiṃ cea khalo posijjaṃto siṇehadāṇehiṃ /
text.339: taṃ cea ālaaṃ dīvao vva aïreṇa maïlei /
text.340: hoṃtī vi ṇipphala ccia dhaṇariddhī hoi kiviṇapurisassa /
text.342: phurie vāmacchi tae jaï ehii so pio jja tā suiraṃ /
text.344: suṇahapaürammi gāme hiṃḍaṃtī tuha kaeṇa sā vālā /
text.345: pāsaasāri vva gharaṃghareṇa kaïā vi khajjihaï /
text.346: aṇṇaṇṇaṃ kusumarasaṃ jaṃ kira so mahaï mahuaro pāuṃ /
text.347: taṃ ṇīrasāṇa doso kusumāṇaṃ ṇea bhamarassa /
text.349: dāraṇihiehi dohi vi maṃgalakalasehi va thaṇehiṃ /
text.350: tā ruṇṇaṃ jā ruvvaï tā jhīṇaṃ jāva jhijjae aṃgaṃ /
text.351: tā ṇīsasia varāīa jāva sāsā pahuppaṃti /
text.353: mihuṇāṇa maraï jaṃ taṃ khu jiaï iaraṃ muaṃ hoi /
text.356: jo kaha vi maha sahīhiṃ chiddaṃ lahiūṇa pesio hiae /
text.357: so māṇo coriakāmuo vva diṭṭhe pie ṇaṭṭho /
text.358: sahiāhi bhaṇṇamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusuṃbhaüpphaṃ ti /
text.360: ummūleṃti va hiaaṃ imāi re tuha virajjamāṇassa /
text.362: ṇa muaṃti dīhasāse ṇa ruaṃti ciraṃ ṇa hoṃti kisiāo /
text.363: dhaṇṇāu tāu jāṇaṃ vahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumaṃ /
text.366: jīviasesāi mae gamiā kaha kaha vi pemmaduddolī /
text.367: eṇhuṃ viramasu re ḍaḍḍha hiaa mā rajjasu kahiṃ pi /
text.370: taṃ ṇamaha jassa vacche lacchimuhaṃ kotthuhammi saṃkaṃtaṃ /
text.372: mā kuṇa paḍivakkhasuhaṃ aṇuṇesu piaṃ pasāalohillaṃ /
text.376: duṇṇikkhevaam eaṃ puttaa mā sāhasaṃ karijjāsu /
text.377: ettha ṇihittāi maṇe hiaāi puṇo ṇa labbhaṃti /
text.379: aviraahiaā aṇṇaṃ pi kiṃ pi atthi tti ciṃtei /
text.382: appattamaṇṇudukkho kiṃ maṃ kisia tti pucchasi hasaṃto /
text.383: pāvasi jā calacittaṃ piaṃ jaṇaṃ tā tuha kahissaṃ /
text.384: avahatthiūṇa sahijaṃpiāi jāṇaṃ kaeṇa ramio si /
text.385: eāi tāi sokkhāi saṃsao jehi jīassa /
text.386: īsāluo paī se rattiṃ mahuaṃ ṇa dei ucceuṃ /
text.389: ciṃtesi thaṇaharāāsiassa majjhassa vi ṇa bhaṃgaṃ /
text.390: uddhaccho piaï jalaṃ jaha jaha viralaṃgulī ciraṃ pahio /
text.391: pāvāliā vi taha taha dhāraṃ taṇuaṃ pi taṇuei /
text.392: bhicchaaro pecchaï ṇāhimaṃḍalaṃ sā vi tassa muhaaṃdaṃ /
text.393: taṃ caṭṭuaṃ karaṃkaṃ doṇha vi kāā viluṃpaṃti /
text.394: jeṇa viṇā ṇa jivijjaï aṇuṇijjaï so kaāvarāho vi /
text.395: patte vi ṇaaraḍāhe bhaṇa kassa ṇa vallaho aggī /
text.396: vaṃkaṃ ko pulaïjjaü kassa kahijjaü suhaṃ va dukkhaṃ va /
text.397: keṇa samaṃ va hasijjaü pāmarapaüre haaggāme /
text.403: pāā ajja vi dhammia tuha kaha dharaṇiṃ cia chivaṃti /
text.404: acchaü dāva maṇaharaṃ piāi muhadaṃsaṇaṃ aïmahagghaṃ /
text.406: ṇikkammāhi vi chettāhi pāmaro ṇea vaccae vasahiṃ /
text.411: upphaḍaï makkaḍo khokkhei a poṭṭaṃ ca piṭṭei /
text.417: vaṃkahasirīṇa puttaa puṇṇehi jaṇo pio hoi /
text.418: bhama dhammia vīsaddho so suṇaho ajja mārio teṇa /
text.421: phukkaṃto aviaṇhaṃ cuṃvaṃto ko si devvāṇaṃ /
text.422: sahi dummeṃti kalaṃvāiṃ jaha maṃ taha ṇa sesakusumāiṃ /
text.423: ṇūṇaṃ imesu diahesu vahaï guliādhaṇuṃ kāmo /
text.424: ṇā 'haṃ dūī ṇa tumaṃ pio tti ko amha ettha vāvāro /
text.425: sā maraï tujjha aaso eaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo /
text.426: tīa muhāhi tuha muhaṃ tujjha muhāo a majjha calaṇammi /
text.430: dūi tumaṃ cia kusalā kakkhaḍamaüāi jāṇase vottuṃ /
text.431: kaṃḍūipaṃḍaraṃ jaha ṇa hoi taha taṃ karejjāsu /
text.432: mahilāsahassabharie tuha hiae suhaa sā amāaṃtī /
text.433: diahaṃ aṇaṇṇakammā aṃgaṃ taṇuaṃ pi taṇuei /
text.434: khaṇamettaṃ pi ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiaha viiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā /
text.436: aṇṇua ṇā 'haṃ kuviā uvaūhasu kiṃ muhā pasāesi /
text.437: tuha maṇṇusamuppāeṇa majjha māṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ /
text.439: sāhei sāmasavalaṃ va tīa aharo tuha vioe /
text.442: āassa kiṃ ṇu kāhaṃ kiṃ vocchaṃ kaha ṇu hohii imaṃ ti /
text.448: ajjaṃ cea paüttho ajjaṃ cia suṇṇaāi jāāiṃ /
text.450: ciriḍiṃ pi aāṇaṃtā loā loehi goravabbhahiā /
text.451: soṇāratula vva ṇirakkharā vi khaṃdhehi vubbhaṃti /
text.453: mā chivasu tti sarosaṃ samosaraṃtiṃ piaṃ bharimo /
text.455: aṇuaṃpāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā gāḍham uvaūḥā /
text.456: sā taï sahatthadiṇṇaṃ ajja vi re suhaa gaṃdharahiaṃ pi /
text.458: kelīa vi rūseuṃ ṇa tīrae tammi cukkaviṇaammi /
text.459: jāiaehi vi māe imehi avasehi aṃgehiṃ /
text.460: upphulliāi khelaü mā ṇaṃ vārehi hou parikhāmā /
text.462: paürajuāṇo gāmo mahumāso jovvaṇaṃ paī ṭhero /
text.463: juṇṇasurā sāhīṇā asaī mā hou kiṃ maraü /
text.464: vahuso vi kahijjaṃtaṃ tuha vaaṇaṃ majjha hatthasaṃdiṭṭhaṃ /
text.465: ṇa suaṃ ti jaṃpamāṇā puṇaruttasaaṃ kuṇaï ajjā /
text.467: saṃvaraṇavāvaḍāe aṇṇo vi jaṇo taha ccea /
text.468: geṇhaha puloaha imaṃ pahasiavaaṇā païssa appei /
text.470: acchaü tā jaṇavāo hiaaṃ cia attaṇo tuha pamāṇaṃ /
text.471: taha taṃ si maṃdaṇeho jaha ṇa uvālaṃbhajoggo si /
text.473: āāsavahehi bhamaṃta hiaa kaïā vi bhajjihisi /
text.474: ahava guṇa ccia lahuā ahavā guṇaaṇṇuo ṇa so loo /
text.475: ahava mhi ṇigguṇā vā vahuguṇavaṃto jaṇo tassa /
text.476: phuṭṭaṃteṇa vi hiaeṇa māmi kaha ṇivvarijjae tammi /
text.477: addāe paḍiviṃva vva jammi dukkhaṃ ṇa saṃkamaï /
text.478: pāsāsaṃkī kāo ṇe 'cchaï diṇṇaṃ pi pahiaghariṇīe /
text.481: do tiṇṇi tahiṃ mia coriāi rehā pusijjaṃti /
text.482: tuha muhasāricchaṃ ṇa lahaï tti saṃpuṇṇamaṃḍalo vihiṇā /
text.483: aṇṇamaaṃ va ghaḍeuṃ puṇo vi khaṃḍijjaï miaṃko /
text.484: ajjaṃ gao tti ajjaṃ gao tti ajjaṃ gao tti gaṇirīe /
text.485: paḍhama ccia diahaddhe kuḍḍo rehāhi cittalio /
text.486: ṇa vi taha paḍhamasamāgamasuraasuhe pāvie vi parioso /
text.489: aha maṇṇe maaṇasarā jaṇassa je hoṃti te hoṃtu /
text.490: iaro jaṇo ṇa pāvaï tuha jahaṇāruhaṇasaṃgamasuhelliṃ /
text.492: jo jassa vihavasāro taṃ so dei tti kiṃ tha accheraṃ /
text.493: aṇahoṃtaṃ pi hu diṇṇaṃ dohaggaṃ taï savattīṇaṃ /
text.494: caṃdasarisaṃ muhaṃ se saraso amaassa muharaso tissā /
text.498: vālaa tumāhi ahiaṃ ṇiaaṃ cia vallahaṃ mahaṃ jīaṃ /
text.499: taṃ taï viṇā ṇa hoi tti teṇa kuviaṃ pasāemi /
text.500: pattia ṇa pattiaṃtī jaï tujjha ime ṇa majjha ruirīe /
text.502: taṃ mittaṃ kāavvaṃ jaṃ kira vasaṇammi desaālammi /
text.505: uḍḍei vihaṃgaülaṃ hāhā pakkhehi va bhaṇaṃtaṃ /
text.506: saccaṃ bhaṇāmi vālaa ṇa tthi asakkaṃ vasaṃtamāsassa /
text.507: gaṃdheṇa kuruvaāṇaṃ maṇaṃ pi asaïttanaṃ ṇa gaā /
text.510: tā kiṃ kareu jaï taṃ si tīa vaïveḍhapelliathaṇīe /
text.514: taï volaṃte vālaa tissā aṃgāi taha ṇu valiāiṃ /
text.516: tā majjhimo ccia varaṃ dujjaṇasuaṇehi dohi vi ṇa kajjaṃ /
text.517: jaha diṭṭho tavaï khalo tahea suaṇo aīsaṃto /
text.519: so vi sudiṭṭho hohii tumaṃ pi muddhā kalijjhihisi /
text.522: pāṇaüḍīa vi jaliūṇa huavaho jalaï jaṇṇavāḍammi /
text.523: ṇa hu te parihariavvā visamadasāsaṃṭhiā purisā /
text.524: jaṃ tujjha saī jāā asaīo suhaa jaṃ ca amhe vi /
text.525: tā kiṃ phuṭṭaü vīaṃ tujjha samāṇo juā ṇa tthi /
text.526: savvassammi vi ḍaḍḍhe taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvui ccea /
text.527: jaṃ tena gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio /
text.528: jāejja vaṇuddese khujjo vi hu ṇīsaho siḍhilavatto /
text.529: mā māṇusammi loe cāī rasio dariddo a /
text.530: tassa a sohaggaguṇaṃ amahilasarisaṃ ca sāhasaṃ majjha /
text.532: te voliā vaassā tāṇa kuḍuṃgāṇa khaṇṇuā sesā /
text.533: amhe vi gaavaāo mūluccheaṃ gaaṃ pemmaṃ /
text.536: jassa jahiṃ cia paḍhamaṃ tissā aṃgammi ṇivaḍiā diṭṭhī /
text.537: tassa tahiṃ cea ṭhiā savvaṃgaṃ keṇa vi ṇa diṭṭhaṃ /
text.538: virahe visaṃ va visamā amaamaā hoi saṃgame ahiaṃ /
text.539: kiṃ vihiṇā samaaṃ cia dohiṃ pi piā viṇimmaviā /
text.546: saccaṃ bhaṇāmi maraṇe ṭhia mhi puṇṇe taḍammi tāvīe /
text.547: ajja vi tattha kuḍuṃge ṇivaḍaï diṭṭhī taha ccea /
text.548: aṃdhaaravorapatthiṃ va māuā maha païṃ viluṃpaṃti /
text.549: īsāaṃti maha ccia cheppāhiṃto phaṇo jāo /
text.551: uaha taṇuī ṇa māaï ruṃdāsu vi gāmaracchāsu /
text.553: viralo hu jāṇaï jaṇo uppaṇṇe jaṃpiavvāiṃ /
text.554: chajjaï pahussa laliaṃ piāi māṇo khamā samatthassa /
text.555: jāṇaṃtassa a bhaṇiaṃ moṇaṃ ca aāṇamāṇassa /
text.557: sotthi ccia ṇa samappaï piasahi lehammi kiṃ lihimo /
text.558: devvammi parāhutte pattia ghaḍiaṃ pi vihaḍaï ṇarāṇaṃ /
text.559: kajjaṃ vāluavaraṇaṃ va kaha vi vaṃdhaṃ cia ṇa dei /
text.560: māmi hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe /
text.562: jiviaṃ asāsaaṃ cia ṇa ṇiattaï jovvaṇaṃ aïkkaṃtaṃ /
text.563: diahā diahehi samā ṇa hoṃti kiṃ ṇiṭṭhuro loo /
text.564: uppāiadavvāṇa vi khalāṇa ko bhāaṇaṃ khalo ccea /
text.565: pikkāi vi ṇiṃvaphalāi ṇavara kāehi khajjaṃti /
text.566: ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa /
text.568: suaṇo ṇa kuppaï ccia aha kuppaï vippiaṃ ṇa ciṃtei /
text.569: aha ciṃtei ṇa jaṃpaï aha jaṃpaï lajjio hoi /
text.570: so attho jo hatthe taṃ mittaṃ jaṃ ṇiraṃtaraṃ vasaṇe /
text.571: taṃ rūaṃ jattha guṇā taṃ viṇṇāṇaṃ jahiṃ dhammo /
text.572: caṃdamuhi caṃdadhavalā dīhā dīhacchi tuha vioammi /
text.573: caüjāmā saajāma vva jāmiṇī kaha vi volīṇā /
text.574: aülīṇo domuhao tā mahuro bhoaṇaṃ muhe jāva /
text.575: murao vva khalo jiṇṇammi bhoaṇe virasam ārasaï /
text.577: jaha vārio vi gharasāmieṇa āliṃdae vasio /
text.578: lahuaṃti lahuṃ purisaṃ pavvaamettaṃ pi do vi kajjāiṃ /
text.585: gūsasiuṃ pi ṇa tīraï kiṃ puṇa gaṃtuṃ haathaṇehiṃ /
text.587: raṃguttiṇṇaṃ ca piaṃ puttaa kāmaṃtao hohi /
text.592: sā tujjha kae vālaa aṇisaṃ gharadāratoraṇaṇisaṇṇā /
text.593: osūsaï vaṃdaṇamālia vva diahaṃ cia varāī /
text.596: ajja mhi hāsiā māmi teṇa pāesu taha paḍaṃteṇa /
text.598: aṇuvattaṇaṃ kuṇaṃto vese vi jaṇe ahiṇṇamuharāo /
text.599: appavaso vi hu suaṇo paravvaso āhiāīe /
text.604: kaha ṇāma tīa taha so sahāvagaruo vi thaṇaharo paḍio /
text.605: ahavā mahilāṇa ciraṃ ko vi ṇa hiaammi saṃṭhāi /
text.606: suanu vaaṇaṃ chivaṃtaṃ sūraṃ mā sāulīa vārehi /
text.607: eassa paṃkaassa a jāṇaü kaaraṃ suhapphaṃsaṃ /
text.608: māṇosahaṃ va pijjaï piāi māṇaṃsiṇīa daïassa /
text.610: kaha sā ṇivvaṇṇijjaü jīa jahāloiammi aṃgammi /
text.611: diṭṭhī duvvalagāi vva paṃkapaḍiā ṇa uttaraï /
text.612: kīraṃti ccia ṇāsaï uae reha vva khalaaṇe mettī /
text.613: sā uṇa suaṇammi kaā aṇahā pāhāṇareha vva /
text.614: avvo ukkaraāraa puṇo vi tattiṃ karesi gamaṇassa /
text.615: ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīa taraṃgiṇo cihurā /
text.616: ṇa vi taha chearaāi vi haraṃti puṇaruttarāarasiāiṃ /
text.617: jaha jattha va tattha va jaha va taha va sabbhāvaṇeharamiāiṃ /
text.618: ujjhasi piāi samaaṃ taha vi hu re bhaṇasu kīsa kisia tti /
text.619: uaribhareṇa aāṇua muaï vaïllo vi aṃgāiṃ /
text.620: daḍhamūlavaddhagaṃṭhi vva moiā kaha vi teṇa me vāhū /
text.621: amhehi vi tassa ure khutta vva samukkhaā thaṇaā /
text.624: seacchaleṇa pecchaha taṇue aṃgammi se amāaṃtaṃ /
text.626: devvāattammi phale kiṃ kīraü ettiaṃ puṇo bhaṇimo /
text.628: dhuaï vva maakalaṃkaṃ kavolapaḍiassa māṇiṇī uaha /
text.630: gaṃdheṇa appaṇo māliāṇa ṇomāliā ṇa phuṭṭihaï /
text.631: aṇṇo ko vi haāsāi maṃsalo parimaluggāro /
text.636: tuṃgo ccia hoi maṇo maṇaṃsiṇo aṃtimāsu vi dasāsu /
text.637: atthamaṇammi vi raïṇo kiraṇā uddhaṃ cia phuraṃti /
text.638: poṭṭaṃ bharaṃti saüṇā vi māuā appaṇo aṇuvviggā /
text.639: vihaluddharaṇasahāvā huvaṃti jaï ke vi sappurisā /
text.640: ṇa viṇā sabbhāveṇaṃ gheppaï paramatthajāṇuo loo /
text.642: raṇṇāu taṇaṃ raṇṇāu pāṇiaṃ savvado saaṃgāhaṃ /
text.643: taha vi maāṇa maīṇa a āmaraṇaṃtāi pemmāiṃ /
text.644: tāvam avaṇei ṇa tahā caṃdaṇapaṃko vi kāmimihuṇāṇaṃ /
text.646: tuppāṇaṇā kiṇo acchasi tti paripucchiāi vahuāi /
text.648: hiaa ccea vilīṇo ṇa sāhio jāṇiūṇa gharasāraṃ /
text.652: jaha jaha uvvahaï vahū ṇavajovvaṇamaṇaharāi aṃgāi /
text.653: taha taha se taṇuāaï majjho daïo a paḍivakkho /
text.654: jaha jaha jarāpariṇao hoi paī duggao virūo vi /
text.655: kulavāliāṇa taha taha ahiaaraṃ vallaho hoi /
text.656: eso māmi juāṇo vāraṃ vāreṇa jaṃ aḍaaṇāo /
text.659: hiaeṇa samaṃ asaīṇa paḍaï vāāhaaṃ pattaṃ /
text.660: pecchaï aladdhalakkhaṃ dīhaṃ ṇīsasaï suṇṇaaṃ hasaï /
text.661: jaha jaṃpaï aphuḍatthaṃ taha se hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ pi /
text.662: gahavaï gao mha saraṇaṃ rakkhasu eaṃ ti aḍaaṇā bhaṇiuṃ /
text.663: sahasāgaassa turiaṃ païṇo ccia jāram appei /
text.664: hiaechiassa dijjaü taṇuāaṃtiṃ ṇa pecchaha piucchā /
text.665: hiaechio mha katto bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā kuarī /
text.670: aha amha āao ajja kulaharāo tti cheṃchaī jāraṃ /
text.676: jaha jaha vāei pio taha taha ṇaccāmi caṃcale pemme /
text.677: vallī valei aṃgaṃ sahāvathaddhe vi rukkhammi /
text.678: dukkhehi labbhaï pio laddho dukkhehi hoi sāhīṇo /
text.679: laddho vi aladdho ccia jaï jaha hiaaṃ taha ṇa hoi /
text.681: saralasahāvo vi pio aviṇaamaggaṃ valā ṇīo /
text.682: hatthesu a pāesu a aṃguligaṇaṇāi aïgaā diahā /
text.683: eṇhiṃ uṇa keṇa gaṇijjaü tti bhaṇiuṃ ruaï muddhā /
text.686: jaṃ jaṃ pihulaṃ aṃgaṃ taṃ taṃ jāaṃ kisoari kisaṃ te /
text.687: jaṃ taṃ taṇuaṃ taṃ taṃ pi ṇiṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ tha māṇeṇa /
text.688: ṇa guṇeṇa hīraï jaṇo hīraï jo jeṇa bhāvio teṇa /
text.693: bhisiṇemi tti piaamaṃ hatthe gaṃdhodaaṃ jāaṃ /
text.696: acchīi tā thaïssaṃ dohi vi hatthehi tammi diṭṭhammi /
text.697: aṃgaṃ kalaṃvakusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kaha ṇu ḍhakkissaṃ /
text.700: bhuṃjasu jaṃ sāhīṇaṃ katto loṇaṃ kugāmariddhammi /
text.701: suhaa saloṇeṇa vi kiṃ teṇa siṇeho jahiṃ ṇatthi /
text.703: taha piaï paaïkaḍuaṃ pi osahaṃ jaha ṇa ṇiṭṭhāi /
text.704: aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ vvia vāṇīravaṇammi cuvakasaṃkeā /
text.706: daḍharosakalusiassa vi suaṇassa muhāhi vippiaṃ kaṃto /
text.707: rāhumuhammi vi sasiṇo kiraṇā amaaṃ via muaṃti /
text.708: avamānio vi ṇa tahā dummijjaï sajjaṇo vihavahīṇo /
text.714: piadaṃsaṇasuharasamaüliāi jaï se ṇa hoṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ /
text.715: tā keṇa kaṇṇaraïaṃ lakkhijjaï kuvalaaṃ tissā /
text.718: dummeṃti deṃti sokkhaṃ kuṇaṃti aṇurāaaṃ ramāveṃti /
text.720: kusumamaā vi aïkharā aladdhaphaṃsā vi dūsahapaāvā /
text.721: bhiṃdaṃtā vi raïarā kāmassa sarā vahuviappā /
text.722: īsaṃ jaṇeṃti dāveṃti mammahaṃ vippiaṃ sahāveṃti /
text.723: virahe ṇa deṃti mariuṃ aho guṇā tassa vahumaggā /
text.732: sūracchaleṇa puttaa kassa tumaṃ aṃjaliṃ paṇāmesi /
text.736: geacchaleṇa bhariuṃ kassa tumaṃ ruasi ṇibbharukkaṃṭhaṃ /
text.738: vahalatamāhaarāī ajja paüttho paī gharaṃ suṇṇaṃ /
text.739: taha jaggesu saajjia ṇa jahā amhe musijjāmo /
text.742: ṇūṇaṃ hiaaṇihittāi vasasi jāāi amha hiaammi /
text.743: aṇṇaha maṇorahā me sāhasu kaha tīa viṇṇāā /
text.744: taï suhaa aīsaṃte tissā acchīhi kaṇṇalaggehiṃ /
text.747: duhiāi mae kālo kettiametto vva ṇeavvo /
text.754: jaï so ṇa vallaho ccia gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa sahi kīsa /
text.755: hoi muhaṃ te raviaraphaṃsavisaṭṭaṃ va tāmarasaṃ /
text.758: ṇiaāṇumāṇaṇīsaṃka hiaa de pasia virama ettāhe /
text.762: jhijjaṃtehi aṇudiṇaṃ paccakkhammi vi tumammi aṃgehiṃ /
text.763: vālaa pucchijjaṃtī ṇa āṇimo kassa kiṃ bhaṇimo /
text.766: aṇṇaha ṇa tīraï ccia parivaḍḍhaṃtagaruaṃ piaamassa /
text.768: vaṇṇaṃtīhi tuha guṇe vahuso amhehi chiṃchaīpurao /
text.769: vālaa saam ea kao si dullaho kassa kuppāmo /
text.770: jāo so vi vilakkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍham uvaūḍho /
text.772: kaṃḍujjuā varāī ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa /
text.774: avarāhehi vi ṇa tahā pattia jaha maṃ imehi dummesi /
text.778: mā vacca pupphalāvira devā uaaṃjalīhi tūsaṃti /
text.781: sahi deṃtī ṇīsāsaṃtaresu kīsa mha dūmesi /
text.782: sabbhāvaṃ pucchaṃtī vālaa roāviā tuha piāe /
text.783: ṇa tthi ccia kaasavahaṃ hāsummissaṃ bhaṇaṃtīe /
text.784: ettha mae ramiavvaṃ tīa samaṃ ciṃtiūṇa hiaeṇa /
text.788: ajjaṃ mohaṇasuhiaṃ mua tti mottuṃ palāie halie /
text.791: amhārisīhi diṭṭhe piammi appā vi vīsario /
text.792: taṇueṇa vi taṇuijjaï khīṇeṇa vi khijjae valā imiṇā /
text.793: majjhattheṇa vi majjheṇa putti kaha tujjha paḍivakkho /
text.794: vāhi vva vejjarahio dhaṇarahio saaṇamajjhavāso vva /
text.796: ko ttha jaammi samattho thaïuṃ vitthiṇṇaṇimmaluttuṃgaṃ /
text.797: hiaaṃ tujjha ṇarāhiva gaaṇaṃ va paohare mottuṃ /
text.808: kiṃ ṇa bhaṇio si vālaa gāmaṇidhūāi guruaṇasamakkhaṃ /
text.811: puṇaruttapeccharīe vālaa kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si /
text.812: jo sīsammi viiṇṇo majjha juāṇehi gaṇavaī āsi /
text.813: taṃ cia eṇhiṃ paṇamāmi haajare hohi saṃtuṭṭhā /
text.817: jāaṃti jassa virahe teṇa samaṃ kīriso māṇo /
text.818: teṇa ṇa marāmi maṇṇūhi pūriā ajja jeṇa re suhaa /
text.819: taggaamaṇā maraṃtī mā tujjha puṇo vi laggissaṃ /
text.820: avarajjhasu vīsaddhaṃ savvaṃ te suhaa visahimo amhe /
text.821: guṇaṇibbharammi hiae pattia dosā ṇa māaṃti /
text.823: parivāho via dukkhassa vahaï ṇaaṇaṭṭhio vāho /
text.824: jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ jaṃpasi jaha jaha tumaṃ ṇiacchesi /
text.825: taṃ tam aṇusikkhirīe dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï /
text.826: bhaṃḍaṃtīa taṇāiṃ sottuṃ diṇṇāi jāi pahiassa /
text.827: tāi ccea pahāe ajjā āaḍḍhaï ruaṃtī /
text.828: vasaṇammi aṇuvviggā vihavammi agavviā bhae dhīrā /
text.830: ajja sahi keṇa gose kaṃ pi maṇe vallahaṃ bharaṃteṇa /
text.835: saraso muṇālakavalo gaassa hatthe ccia milāṇo /
text.836: pasia pie kā kuviā suaṇu tumaṃ paraaṇammi ko kovo /
text.837: ko hu paro ṇāha tumaṃ kīsa aüṇṇāṇa me sattī /
text.838: ehisi tumaṃ ti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīa paḍhamaddhaṃ /
text.840: avalaṃvaha mā saṃkaha ṇa imā gahalaṃghiā paribbhamaï /
text.843: jaï bhamara tettio aṇṇahiṃ pi tā sohasi bhamaṃto /
text.846: kassa bharasi tti bhaṇie ko me atthi tti jaṃpamāṇīe /
text.848: pāapaḍiaṃ ahavve kiṃ dāṇi ṇa uṭṭhavesi bhattāraṃ /
text.849: eaṃ cia avasāṇaṃ dūraṃ pi gaassa pemmassa /
text.854: jettiamettā racchā ṇiaṃva kaha tettio ṇa jāo si /
text.855: jeṇa chivijjaï guruaṇalajjosario vi so suhao /
text.860: rāaviruddhaṃ va kahaṃ pahio pahiassa sāhaï sasaṃkaṃ /

text.2010: e ehi dāva suṃdari kaṇṇaṃ dāūṇa suṇasu vaaṇijjaṃ /
text.2011: tujjha muheṇa kisoari caṃdo uamijjaï jaṇeṇa /
text.2016: kā visamā devvagaī kiṃ dullabbhaṃ jaṇo guṇaggāhī /
text.2017: kiṃ sokkhaṃ sukalattaṃ kiṃ dukkhaṃ jaṃ khalo loo /
text.2018: kivaṇāṇa dhaṇaṃ ṇāāṇa phaṇamaṇī kesarāi sīhāṇaṃ /
text.2019: kulavāliāṇa a thaṇā katto jhiyyaṃti amuāṇaṃ /
text.2020: kesesu valāmoḍia teṇa samarammi jaassirī gahiā /
text.2021: jaha kaṃdarāhi vihurā tassa daḍhaṃ kaṃṭhaammi saṃṭhaviā /
text.2022: khalavavahārā dīsaṃti dāruṇā jaha vi taha vi dhīrāṇaṃ /
text.2024: jaṃ parihariuṃ tīraï maṇaṃ pi ṇa suṃdaraattaṇaguṇeṇa /
text.2025: aha ṇavaram assa doso paḍivacchehiṃ pi paḍivaṇṇo /
text.2027: rasasammuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā /
text.2028: jassea vaṇo tassea veaṇā bhaṇaï taṃ jaṇo aliaṃ /
text.2030: jahā gahiro jahā raaṇaṇibbharo jaha a ṇimmalacchāo /
text.2031: taha kiṃ vihiṇā eso sabāṇio jalaṇihī ṇa kio /
text.2033: dāvei bhuaṇamaṃḍalam aṇṇaṃ via (cia?) jaaï sā vāṇī /
text.2035: vuḍḍhā vi ṇavoḍha vva paravahū aha haraï tuha hiaaṃ /
text.2038: ṇavapuṇṇimāmiaṃkassa suhaa ko taṃ si bhaṇasu maha saccaṃ /
text.2039: kā sohaggasamaggā paosaraaṇi vva tuha ajja /
text.2044: tālā jāaṃti guṇā jālā de sahiaehi gheppaṃti /
text.2046: tuha vallahassa gosammi āsi aharo milāṇakamaladalo /
text.2047: ia ṇavavahuā soūṇa kuṇaï vaaṇaṃ mahīsamuhaṃ /
text.2048: maha desu rasaṃ dhamme tamavasam āsaṃ gamāgamā hara ṇe /
text.2049: haravahu saraṇaṃ taṃ cittamoham avasaraü me sahasā /
text.2050: rāīsu caṃdadhavalāsu laliam āphāliūṇa jo cāvaṃ /
text.2052: lahiūṇa tujjha vāhupphaṃsaṃ jīe sa ko vi ullāso /
text.2053: jaalacchī tuha virahe ṇa hu 'jjalā duvvalāṇaṃ sā /
text.2055: thaṇaharavaassaeṇaṃ visuddhajāī ṇa calaï se hāro /
text.2057: dīsaï aha va ṇisammaï sarisaṃ aṃsaṃsametteṇa /
text.2059: hāro ṇivārao ccia ucchīraṃto tadā kahaṃ ramiaṃ /
text.2060: so ṇa tthi ettha gāmo jo eaṃ mahamahaṃtalāaṇṇaṃ /
text.2063: tīe khaṃdhāhi valaṃ gahia saro suraasaṃgare jaaï /
text.2064: homi vahatthiareho ṇiraṃkuso aha vivearahio vi /
text.2065: siviṇe vi tumammi puṇo pattihi bhattiṃ ṇa sumarāmi /
